title: Sunlight does not penetrate water to great depths

content.question: Phytoplankton are most abundant in the upper few hundred feet of most bodies of water because

choices.label: they can most readily hide from predators there
sunlight does not penetrate to great depths in water
as primary producers, they must be accessible to many other organisms
they feed on zooplankton, which are found only in the top layers of water

content.answer: sunlight does not penetrate to great depths in water

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
